name: Clutchfans Ad-Post Removal
description:
This removes the advertisement post in all threads on the Clutchfans BBS (the one that appears at the top of the thread just under the original post) - not just the advertisement, but the whole post.

Use in conjunction with style 299 to remove all ads on the board.


UPDATE: Rewrite for compatibility with the changes made to Clutchfans.
UPDATE 2: Same as above, just newer.
UPDATE 3: Now removes all that Facebook bullshit!

UPDATE 4 (July 2015): Fixes for minor site changes
